# id: ActionRequestFailureHandler -> void onFailure(ActionRequest action, Throwable failure, int restStatusCode, RequestIndexer indexer) throws Throwable_
commentText: Handle a failed {@link ActionRequest}.__@param action the {@link ActionRequest} that failed due to the failure_@param failure the cause of failure_@param restStatusCode the REST status code of the failure (-1 if none can be retrieved)_@param indexer request indexer to re-add the failed action, if intended to do so__@throws Throwable if the sink should fail on this failure, the implementation should rethrow_the exception or a custom one
codeText: void onFailure(ActionRequest action, Throwable failure, int restStatusCode, RequestIndexer indexer) throws Throwable_
